question: India’s first training and performance programme of world-famous KHON Ramlila is organized by Uttar Pradesh with the collaboration of which of the following countries?
explanation: KHON Ramlila is organized by Uttar Pradesh with the collaboration of the Thailand government. KHON Ramlila is a form of masked dance depicting the scenes of Ramlila. It is included in the list of UNESCO’s Intangible cultural heritage.
